name: Crescent Pike
r1: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20% ATK as DMG for 5s.
r2: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 25% ATK as DMG for 5s.
r3: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 30% ATK as DMG for 5s.
r4: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 35% ATK as DMG for 5s.
r5: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 40% ATK as DMG for 5s.
